CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(RW_Registration_Status__c, 'Registration Completed') , if((RW_Registration_Date__c - DATEVALUE(Booking_Date__c)-45>0),RW_Registration_Date__c - DATEVALUE(Booking_Date__c)-45,0),
if((TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Booking_Date__c)-45>0),TODAY()- DATEVALUE(Booking_Date__c)-45, 0))
CustomField.label: Registration Ageing
